channel.title: Big list of superbly successful bootstrapped companies
channel.description: Seeing as we are a forum specifically for Bootstrappers, this article should be interesting: https://techcrunch.com/2017/07/01/invisible-unicorns-35-big-companies-that-started-with-little-or-no-money/

item.title: Big list of superbly successful bootstrapped companies
item.dc:creator: mijustin
item.description:
Sweet!

Notable omissions:

  • Nathan Barry’s ConvertKit (Over $700k in MRR)
  • Peldi’s Balsamiq (long running and very profitable)
  • Ruben’s Bidsketch (also long running and profitable)

Read full topic
item.source: Big list of superbly successful bootstrapped companies

item.title: Big list of superbly successful bootstrapped companies
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
Seeing as we are a forum specifically for Bootstrappers, this article should be interesting:

TechCrunch

Invisible unicorns: 35 big companies that started with little or no money

There’s a widespread belief among founders that venture capital is a precursor to success. VC is a common denominator of the most successful tech startups,..
